lead_paragraph: When former U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro began his latest comeback in March he said he was playing for fun after three operations on his wrist.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Surprising Himself With Last-16 Run
headline.main: Del Potro Surprising Himself With Last-16 Run
